Description :
        I didn't know then. The fact that these things my father left behind, will devour my destiny.' With his instant memory recall ability, Jin Yong-woon is attacked by an unidentified assailant, but he manages to avoid the crisis thanks to a mysterious artifact and travels back in time to the Three Kingdoms era.
